instruction: Find an example of a prestigious scholarship available in your country.
output: In the United States, the Fulbright Scholars Program is one of the most prestigious and competitive scholarship programs. It is funded by the U.S. Department of State and provides grants for graduate students to pursue their studies in any field of study in many countries outside of the United States. It also attracts prominent scholars from around the world to study, teach, and conduct research in the United States.
